[data-ref=unplanned] .b-grid-header.title: Unplanned sessions
[data-ref=unplanned] .b-grid-header.content:
Drag these session onto the schedule to assign to a room.

Note: This demo uses the Bryntum Grid component which is licensed separately.

.b-sch-event.title: Unassign
.b-sch-event.content: Right click a session and select 'Unschedule session' to move it to unassigned sessions
